snippet: An electoral court has removed the president, the wife of his longtime rival and a former president from its list of candidates, officials said.
abstract: Madagascar electoral court removes Pres Andry Rajoelina, Lalao Ravalomanana and her husband and former president Marc Ravalomanana from list of presidential candidates eligible to run in country's election.
lead_paragraph: An electoral court has removed the president, the wife of his longtime rival and a former president from its list of candidates, officials said.

headline.main: Top Presidential Candidates Barred From Election in Madagascar
headline.print_headline: Top Presidential Candidates Barred From Election in Madagascar
